title: Matt and Zack (from the road!)
description:
Matt calls in from the Adventure Drives finish line to talk about the Lamborghini Urus, why its actually a stealthy speed machine that cops don't see, and describe a few of the roads and sights of his trip. 

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Get the audio-only version of this show with any podcast app (except Stitcher) or at:

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst

 

Watch the show: https://youtu.be/jOoYKya30lg
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
